author: norman
msg: We need to call the coreCmd on HookResultCode.OK so no other hooks will get called and the coreCmd can take care of doing all final work like adding the recipient to the recipient list etc

author: slaws
msg: Add a dependency on the hazelcast client so we can switch the SCAClient test to the hazelcast client if we want to.

author: bodewig
msg: minimal docs, a bit more tests, tiny optimization and better whitespace handling for the conditions evaluator

author: gbrown
msg: Add suggestion popup state listener interface so suggestion popup skins can pass correct result value to close().

author: slaws
msg: Add a test that just uses the SCAClient to talk to the remote SCA node. I.e. it doesn't start up a full SCA application
